An enhanced experience of StudentVUE     for Mounds View High School students.

How we use your data (we don't)

Your login info and StudentVUE data is never shared, saved, or sold. Period.
All of the website code is open for viewing on Github.

We're tired of the laggy websites and slow loading times. The buggy app that seems to prevent us from seeing that AP score, that one exam we never studied for, that one test that we actually felt good about.

With STUDS, we reimagined your StudentVUE experience.

  • You understand what you're looking at.
  • It doesn't take decades for you to navigate between courses.
  • Better statistics

We're listening to the parents and students
